name: Indigo Project 366 - Online Multiplayer Development Alpha
name_original: Indigo Project 366 - Online Multiplayer Development Alpha
description:
The Online Development Alpha of The Indigo Project 366! Grab three of your friends, and create a room (using an identical room name as eachother!) and you'll be able to choose from 1 of 4 currently playable characters. Once chosen, you'll all be thrust directly into a boss fight potentially in the full game. **Warning!** This current build is not easy! It is difficult for a single person to beat, and without team work it could be hard for even 4! Work together and keep each other in the fight as you take down this boss.

For the full ability list of each playable character, please refer to this Imgur Link: 

https://imgur.com/a/M4h5Zku

When you are attacked by the boss, and your health bar becomes empty, you will be KO-ed and unable to cast abilities. If you are KO-ed that's okay! Your allies can pick you back up by simply healing you in any way, shape, or form. If all of you and your allies are KO-ed, there are none of you that can continue the fight...meaning you have failed. Once this has happened, everyone will need to reset the game in order to try again!

In the upper right is a WIP section, to give you a short preview of the opening cutscene into the game. I hope you find all of this both fun, and interesting, and I hope for your continued support during the development of The Indigo Project 366!
